EmailTemplate.subject: Event Invitation: Pivotal Big Data Event Manila
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, October 14, 2015 Discovery Primea Hotel
6749 Ayala Ave
Makati
1226 Metro Manila
Philippines REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow> Join data technology experts from Pivotal to get the latest perspective on how big data analytics and applications are transforming organizations across industries. This event provides an opportunity to learn about new developments in the rapidly-changing world of big data and understand best practices in building advanced analytics and data-driven applications. Additionally, attendees will engage in hands-on data science and application development training using Pivotal’s market-leading Big Data Suite. Register <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM - 9:30 AM The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise
9:30 AM - 10:00 AM Keynote: Identifying The Real Business Value of your Data
10:00 AM - 10:30 PM Roundtable Discussion: The Real Business Value of your Data
10:30 AM - 10:40 PM Break
10:40 AM - 11:10 PM Architecture Overview
11:10 AM - 11:30 PM Demo: Internet of Things
11:30 AM - 1:00 PM Hands On Technical Workshop
1:00 AM - 2:00 PM Lunch
VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=data-roadshow>
